title: Pixel 2 randomly freezes then gets corrupt.
content:
Twice this has happened now. I'll be using my phone and the screen will become unresponsive, then go black. I'll try a restart but will get the android logo saying my phone crashed and has corrupt data. I factory reset the first time.

It happened again just now except it went black and now wont respond at all. I can't get it to power on. I have it plugged in a charger and there is no indication that it is taking a charge. I had over 60% battery upon crashing.

I've held power over 2 minutes straight with nothing. I've held power and volume down with no luck.

How do I get it to start and at least factory reset if the thing is completely bricked?

I haven't downloaded any new apps recently or damaged the phone in any way. Why would it act up twice out of the blue?
